#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int e,n,m,i,s,sum,a[100];
    int t=1;

        while((scanf("%d",&n)&&n!=0))

         {

          s=0;

            if(n!=0){for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&a[i]);
                s=s+a[i];

            }

            m=s/n;

             sum=0;
            for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                if(a[i]>m)
                {
                    e=a[i]-m;

                    sum=sum+e;

                }
            }
          }


        printf("Set #%d\n",t++);
        printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",sum);

         }
    return 0;
}
